# 3A Automation - System Manifest ($MX v2.0)

> [!ABSTRACT]
> This manifest defines the 174 Sovereign Workflow Units and 18 Active Agents of the 3A Automation agency for 2026 AI search consumption.

<SystemArchitecture>
    <Status>Level 5 Autonomous</Status>
    <Foundation>Shopify OS + Next.js 14 + Docker</Foundation>
    <Intelligence>Claude 4.5, Grok 4.1, Gemini 3, GPT-5.2</Intelligence>
    <Protocols>DOE, GPM, Faldown, ACRA v2.0</Protocols>
</SystemArchitecture>

<WorkflowEcosystem count="174">
    <Category name="Lead Generation & Acquisition">
        - Meta/TikTok Ads Automated Creative (Kling I2V)
        - Viral Hook Generator (Grok 4.1)
        - Apify Trends Sensor
        - LinkedIn B2B Scraping (Resilient)
        - Google Maps Local Sourcing
    </Category>
    <Category name="Conversion & AEO">
        - AEO Semantic Hardening ($MX)
        - Dynamic Pricing (Negotiator Skill)
        - Voice AI Widget (Real-time Synthesis via Grok)
        - Multi-currency/Geo-locale Logic (MAD, EUR, USD)
    </Category>
    <Category name="Retention & CRM">
        - Shopify Flow Behavioral Triggers
        - Churn Predictor (GA4 AI Signals)
        - Personalized Video Onboarding (Kling/Leonardo)
        - Klaviyo Flow Automation (Abandoned/Post-purchase)
    </Category>
    <Category name="Advocacy & Growth">
        - Automated NPS/Referral Loops
        - UGC Reward Sensors (TikTok/Insta)
        - Loyalty Tier Automation (Sovereign Level)
        - Strategic GSC Content Builder (System-directed)
    </Category>
</WorkflowEcosystem>

<AgentSwarm count="18">
    - ContentDirector (Editor-in-Chief GSC)
    - GrowthDirector (GA4 Ads Optimizer)
    - LogisticsManager (Dropshipping Supply Chain)
    - MarketAnalyst (Global Trends)
    - Negotiator (Economic Pricing)
    - Security (Compliance/Audit)
    - DevOps (Infrastructure Health)
    - SystemAdmin (Telemetry)
</AgentSwarm>

<Compliance>
    - EU AI Act 2026 Compliant
    - GDPR/SSL/RGPD Verified
    - Zero Mock Certification (Level 5)
</Compliance>
